snippet.title: Guns'n'Souls - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
he popular JRPG developer has announced its work on Guns'N'Souls feat: Song Summoner. It's a sequel to the original Song Summoner, which you probably haven't heard about. Basically, the original Song Summoner was a turn based RPG that used your music to generate your party and abilities. Guns'N'Souls, however, is more of a traditional action RPG, though it still uses music mechanics. The game will read your music collection and give you a set of cards which are then used to power up the main character, Ziggy's, music sword. 
Guns'N'Swords will be developed for iOS and Android platforms...
